tasks.task: Transferring pigs from pasture to trailer
subtasks: Observing weather forecast for impending rain
Deciding to move pigs due to wet ground
Adding straw to the trailer for bedding
Providing food and water for the trailer stay
Ensuring pigs are comfortable in the trailer
Confirming pigs will be ready for harvest in a week
Mitigating access to pond area due to rain
Ensuring pigs stay in trailer during inclement weather
Reminding viewers to like, subscribe, and share
